title: Beyond All Boundaries
description: 23-year-old Nia Price is a dancer. But she is not an ordinary dancer. She is a pole dancer. When her best friend enters her in the talent show, her life turns upside-down and threatening letters she receives from a mysterious admirer, don't help her either.  In the hallway of her apartment, she meets a dark, mysterious man with sky blue eyes, who literally takes her breath away.  29-year-old Jason West is a ladies' man. He loves women and is not hiding it. He's a man every woman desires. But he also loves his profession. He and his best friend are private investigators, who run their own PI agency.  When Nia enters his life, he finally meets a person who does not succumb to his charm. Jason, however, does not give up. He can't forget the feisty and attractive girl who rejected him.  Jason discovers that someone is threatening her, so he takes matters into his own hands and tries to help her desperately. Will he make it in time to save her? To save the girl who stole a part of his heart? Is he willing to go beyond all boundaries?  Adult content: It contains strong language and graphic sexual content
author: J.  Lea
